author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The new American Eagle ad campaign featuring Sydney Sweeney has prompted backlash, divisiveness, and numerous conversations regarding whether or not the campaign was appropriate, inclusive, or potentially leaning towards eugenics. Now fellow celebrity Lizzo has gotten involved with the situation by releasing a song poking fun at Sydney Sweeney and the American Eagle ads. The [...]

The post Lizzo Calls Out Sydney Sweeney And American Eagle In New Song appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Lizzo Calls Out Sydney Sweeney And American Eagle In New Song

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Kristi Noem, the current 8th United States secretary of homeland security, was recently featured in an episode of the animated parody series South Park. The series recently made headlines with its Season 27 premiere that satirized current United States president Donald Trump. Now that the season’s second episode has its sights set on Noem, she [...]

The post Kristi Noem Blasts ‘South Park’ Parody As “Lazy” And “Petty” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Kristi Noem Blasts ‘South Park’ Parody As “Lazy” And “Petty”
